title: Candlestick Patterns - Basics
content: Candlestick charts display price movements with bodies (open-close range) and wicks (high-low range). Common patterns: Doji (indecision, open=close), Hammer (bullish reversal at bottom), Shooting Star (bearish reversal at top), Engulfing (current candle completely covers previous), Morning Star (3-candle bullish reversal), Evening Star (3-candle bearish reversal). Bullish candles close higher than open (usually green/white). Bearish candles close lower than open (usually red/black). Patterns should be confirmed with volume and other indicators. Single candlestick patterns are less reliable than multi-candle patterns.
